Article.ArticleTitle: Palladium-catalyzed direct C(sp<sup>3</sup>)-H arylation of indole-3-ones with aryl halides: a novel and efficient method for the synthesis of nucleophilic 2-monoarylated indole-3-ones.

AbstractText: A novel and efficient method for the synthesis of nucleophilic 2-monoarylated indole-3-ones via palladium-catalyzed direct C(sp3)-H arylation of indole-3-ones with aryl halides has been developed. Various 2-monoarylated indole-3-ones were readily obtained with yields up to 95%. As a class of important nucleophilic intermediates, 2-monoarylated indole-3-ones can be used for the construction of C2-quaternary indolin-3-one skeletons.
